newsitem.title: USA: CNL Realty Inc to become self-managed REIT.
newsitem.headline: CNL Realty Inc to become self-managed REIT.

text.p: Commercial Net Lease Realty Inc said on Friday that its directors had approved a plan that would result in the company becoming a self-administered and self-managed real estate investment trust.
The plan calls for a merger with CNL Realty Advisors Inc, the company's external advisor that currently provides its day-to-day management.
Under the plan, all of the outstanding common stock of the advisor will be exchanged for 220,000 shares of common stock of CNL Realty Inc, the company said in a statement.
The agreement also entitles advisor stockholders to receive up to 1,980,000 additional shares of common stock, based on the company's continued growth.
CNL Realty Inc, an equity real estate investment trust, said it expects the transaction to be accretive to the company's per share funds from operations.
